text: Can it be that the recent updates to the VS Code extension somehow interfere with the inner workings of `Genie.jl`? With the 1.0 branch I could use VS Code for development, but after the update to any of the 1.1 releases VS Code gets stuck when loading the initialization code. The “Julia: Evaluating…” wheel is spinning forever, and upon `Ctrl+C` I get a `ERROR: type Nothing has no field state`. I’ll post the full error in the thread.

elements.text: Can it be that the recent updates to the VS Code extension somehow interfere with the inner workings of `Genie.jl`? With the 1.0 branch I could use VS Code for development, but after the update to any of the 1.1 releases VS Code gets stuck when loading the initialization code. The “Julia: Evaluating…” wheel is spinning forever, and upon
ERROR: type Nothing has no field state
. I’ll post the full error in the thread.
